description:
Generate an enumerated report
Takes a genbank file which has been annotated using the domainator program, write tabulated descriptions of each contig, CDS, or domain.

write a tab-separated file

parameters.name: Input
parameters.help: hmm filenames. If not supplied then reads from to stdin.

parameters.name: Output
parameters.help: The name of the output tsv file.

parameters.name: Html
parameters.help: Write a table in html format to this file.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.help: report the name of the hmm file.

parameters.name: Acc
parameters.help: report the start coordinate of the feature.

parameters.name: Desc
parameters.help: return the end coordinate of the feature.

parameters.name: Length
parameters.help: return the length of the profile (i.e. the number of nodes).

parameters.name: Consensus
parameters.help: return the consensus residue line of the profile, if set..

parameters.name: Append
parameters.help: Supply three strings, a column will be added with the first string as the column name, the second string as the column type (str, int, float) and the third string as the value for all rows. Enter one entry per line; separate multiple values with spaces or commas.

advanced_parameters.name: Html Max Height
advanced_parameters.help: Max height in pixels to set the html output to.

advanced_parameters.name: Column Names
advanced_parameters.help: If supplied, then this list will be used instead of the default column names.
